Ext.menu.Item Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.menu.Item Ext.menu.TextItem menuitem menu
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.menu.Menu', {
        width: 100,
        height: 100,
        floating: false, // usually you want this set to True (default)
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(), // usually rendered by it's containing component
        items: [{
            text: 'icon item',
            iconCls: 'add16'
        }, {
            text: 'text item'
        }, {
            text: 'plain item',
            plain: true
        }]
    });
});
